1.content: A blur... Everything around you was a blur... You had no idea where you were, or even who you were... But the only thing on your mind was escape... You had to escape. You felt yourself slithering along a cold, steel pathway... Loud noises around you, deep and blaring. You didn't like being out in the open like this, it felt bad... Frightening. But you pressed on, regardless. Soon, you find an opening and can feel damp air rushing at you from it... You dive through it, feeling your form flow around the bars as you land with a wet 'plop' outside of... Wherever you were. You had gotten free... But... Now what? You had no idea where this was... There were tall things everywhere, blotting out the light that you could see from beyond the tops of them... As you consider your situation...
1.title: Escape!

choices: Through two sets of eyes, you're inside multiple bodies
A pair of breasts hanging from your new body's chest (Female body)
A smooth, sleek body, a bit muscular (Male body)
A mechanical set of limbs (The body you've possessed is the core of a droid)
11.content: You feel the wind rushing as something encloses around you, an invisible wall preventing you from moving further... They had you... Who or whatever they were. Soon, you're taken back to your holding cell... And you feel yourself sliding through a tube... There was somebody struggling at the other end of it, you could hear them... You were being pulled so thinly through it, though, you couldn't make them out... You hear a scream as you enter their bodies, your own actively flowing through them against your will, as if it had been waiting for this... When you come back to, you see...
11.title: Captured!  Something traps you

111.content: Which two bodies are you through?
111.title: Through two sets of eyes, you're inside mul...

112.content: Which body are you in.
112.title: which body are you in

choices: Attempt to escape from your cell
1121.content:
As the entity awoke, it found itself within a body... She had some curves, though not many, and deep purple fur... She was restrained still, with the tubes still attached to her as she struggled.

"W... Where am I...?" She managed to squeak out... It was so strange having a voice of her own... This... Stolen voice...

"Ah, excellent, our new Blaze has awakened... Keep her in containment and continue monitoring her, I want to ensure that its consciousness has overridden Her Highness's completely..."

The man's voice... That was sounding from thin air... It sounded familiar... Frightening, that's who she was running from...
1121.title: Blaze's body

choices: In a containment tank again...  Like before it escaped.
11212.content:
She began to inquire about who she was, opening her mouth to speak... But as she did, memories, not her own, began flooding into her mind as she gasped, frowning. Memories of the Sol Emeralds, of her royal guard... Adventures with a person called 'Sonic'... Stolen body, stolen thoughts... What WAS she?

"Why... Am I...?" She groaned against her restraints as she trailed off.

"Hmmm... The new personality's conditioning must not have taken hold, which is why it attempted escape... This may be a problem... Keep her sedated, I want to see how our new Blaze reacts..." The threatening voice announced over the intercom. Her body felt weak and limp... She wouldn't be able to move, even if she wasn't restrained.

"Why are you doing this... To her...? Don't... Want to..." She groaned, passing out within her new form. She couldn't tell how long it was until she woke up, but when she did, she was...
11212.title: Learn more about your body

choices: Follow Blaze's Heart and Rescue Her Friends
Escape Yourself and Leave Them Behind
112121.content:
She woke up, still inside of Blaze's body, her head throbbing as she groaned, more thoughts flooding into her mind... They felt less like memories and more like plans... Was she trying to figure things out? "I'm sorry..." She whispered to herself, and then felt confused. "I don't want this either, but I have to..." She blinked, frowning... There were no returning thoughts, just a feeling of confusion... It felt like she was talking to herself. She probably was, too.

After a bit, those same thoughts, of plans of escape entered her head... She was not going to stand idly by and allow herself to be used to control this... Blaze. Her hands tensed as they erupted into flame. She grabbed hold of the bars as they began to become red hot and melt.

"I won't just stand here and let this body rot..." Even now, using phrases like 'this body' was confusing her... The thoughts wondering why she chose such phrasing... It hit her, then... She was Blaze, deep inside of her mind... Blaze's own thoughts were still going on, but it was her choice, not Blaze's, on which to act upon. That would be useful... If she avoided using the wrong kind of wording, then Blaze wouldn't know the difference between actually being in control or not.

The bars soon completely melted as alarms went off. She quickly dashed off, leaving a trail of flame behind her as she sped through the compound. More and more of Blaze's abilities seemed to become natural to their new owner. Flashes of memory came through her head... There were others that were captured as well. She had to rescue them...! At least, that's what Blaze wished...
112121.title: Still inside of Blaze's body

choices: Pick Amy up and drag her away
Possess Amy and Blaze at the same time
1121211.content:
She ran off towards the other cell block, going by Blaze's memories of when she'd been captured, quickly finding Vanilla, Cream and Amy... Their names came up quite quickly, and while the pink hedgehog wasn't as dear a friend as the small rabbit to her, she wished to rescue her none-the-less. Cream jumped up as she saw Blaze, smiling. "Miss Blaze! I knew you'd get out and save us!" She smiled, tears of joy running down her face... Though they were likely to be from fear mere moments before. She only nodded, putting a finger to her mouth to ask them to remain silent, Amy pouting in the corner as she melted the bars like she did her own cell.

Cream and Vanilla quickly made their way out as Amy dawdled behind, head hanging. "I was hoping Sonic would be the one to save us... Can't we just wait here for a bit longer?"

"Are you crazy, Amy?" 'Blaze' groaned, frowning. "We need to get out of here now, before the guards come!"

"No, I'm staying here!"

The entity growled mentally, Blaze's mind frustrated with the hedgehog as well...
1121211.title: Follow Blaze's Heart and Rescue Her Friends

choices: Keep at least one or both
Free them and find a new host
11212112.content:
'Blaze' glared at the hedgehog, the entity controlling her was in no mood for Amy's shenanigans. It was obvious that something needed to be done as a small piece of it dripped out of Blaze's dress without her really even thinking about it... It was like it was running on instinct as Cream frowned, pausing to wait for Amy.

"Miss Amy, please, we have to go!" She called to her as klaxons began going off, Vanilla urging her daughter to continue on as they ran. The small piece of the entity crawled up Amy's leg as she blinked, looking at it. "Ewww, what is that?" She moved her hand to swat it off, but it just pounced its way up her skirt as she gasped. It soaked its way through her panties and into her sex as she shuddered violently before gasping lightly. The entity blinked as it suddenly became aware of two minds, two points of view and two bodies... Amy soon nodded to Blaze as the two smiled nervously back to each other, making a run for it in a synchronous motion. Blaze and Amy soon caught up with Cream and Vanilla, the entity worried inside of the two women... It did not want to do this to these girls, but it had no choice... But why did this feel so right? When it soaked into Amy, it felt... Good.

As they ran, it became easier and easier to have its two bodies do separate tasks, and once they found the exit, they took care of the Badniks guarding it and blasted their way out, taking the two rabbits with them...

But now that it was free, what would it do with its hosts?
11212112.title: Possess Amy and Blaze at the same time

choices: Somebody finds their cave (shouldn't have lit the fire)
112121121.content:
As they ran away from Robotnik's base and back towards the city, the entity within the two women had much time to think... While it initially was against the idea, why should it give up its new skins? It felt good to truly exist, rather than just be a blob of nothing... To have a body, to have friends... The two rabbits, it would leave alone, but perhaps others... As they took shelter for the night after running for hours on end, it made its decision... The ones named Amy and Blaze would be two of its new bodies... And it would have more. While its bodies' minds slept, it consumed them, liquefying them and absorbing everything about them into itself... Their memories, their personalities, their hopes, their dreams... Even a bit of their will, so that they might function on their own. But they would function as its eyes and ears in this world.

Robotnik wanted to use it to control them for his own ends, but in the end, he would consume them so as a single unified will, they would crush him. And then, just to add insult to injury, it would consume the doctor so that he might never hurt anyone again...
112121121.title: Keep at least one or both

1121211211.content: Blaze and Amy both jolt awake as they hear somebody approaching their cave. Amy melted down, her liquid pressed against the side of the cave wall as Blaze looked to make sure the rabbits were still asleep. The person began approaching, their face in shadow as Amy pounced upon them, wrapping her mass around them as she began to flow into a new body. The intruder kicked and struggled as they were invaded by the entity's mass, but soon, their struggles subsided... They got up, their face in the light now. It was...
1121211211.title: Somebody finds their cave (shouldn't have l...

1121212.content:
She shook her head, just dashing out again... She had worked hard to escape the first time, perhaps a body was what she needed to succeed this time... Whomever Blaze's friends were, they would have to escape on their own...

*No...!*

She heard a voice in the back of her head as she stopped, blinking. What in the world... Why did she stop? What was that voice? It sounded... Familiar.

*No, they are my friends!*

There it was again, louder this time... It was the voice of her body! The real Blaze! She gripped her head, concentrating. Of all the dumb luck, her body chose this instant to assert its ownership again. "P-please, I just want to get out of here!" She whimpered, trying to assert herself again.

*No, we're going to go rescue them!* The voice demanded as she began making a step back. She had little choice in the matter now... She concentrated on fighting back, on flooding her body's brain with her essence... She didn't want to steal this body, but she wanted to remain in this place even less! If she had to do something drastic, she would... Blaze's body began to lose its solidity as its true owner took back control while the entity that had been borrowing it began concentrating on something else. She cried out, gurgling and clutching at her chest as she began to dissolve. "What... Are you doing to me?!" The real Blaze cried out in a feeble attempt to resist.

*We are leaving this place now! If I have to claim your body, then I shall, but we are not remaining here!* It screamed within Blaze's mind as she melted down into a puddle. It was working off of instinct, out of a fear of this place, doing what its body knew what to do when a host resisted... Devour it. This put the host's mind in direct contact with its own, though... If it remained in control of the process, Blaze's mind would be consumed... Otherwise... It would lose itself to Blaze, its efforts only giving Blaze its powers.
1121212.title: Escape Yourself and Leave Them Behind

1122.content:
"Sonic, oh Sonic. Oh, where could you be?" A low whimpered voice began echoing through the cave, indicating that there was in fact a visitor. And judging by her voice, she sounded annoying. But, if it was worth it to be free of this murky and old place then it was worth to chose her body. It soon begins following her, it lounged for a body. As it began to come close to a stop, it grabbed the sinkhole that was above it and begins to flow outside. Amy, being a few steps away sees the chaos entity. "Hey, have you seen Sonic?" Amy asked the entity as it stood there, observing the body that would soon become its skin. It's main observant was the young female breasts, that stood upon Amy's chest proudly. Amy, attempting to find Sonic soon plead the chaos entity to move to the side. The chaos entity stood there, motionless as Amy young body began running to a sprint. The chaos entity put a smile as boobed back onto the wall leaving her in slight pain. The chaos entity slowly begin moving to it's target, silently putting up a smile as it grew closer to Amy. Amy tilted her head to see the entity's face, "What are you going to do with me?" Amy asked with a weak and frail voice, finally the chaos entity began using speech and mimicked Amy's voice. "Oh why dear, I'm going to be using your body of course!" The chaos entity begins laughing as Amy stands there, frail and weak.

"What!" Amy screeched as the entity took this opportunity to seize Amy's body. Using it's liquid body, it began pouring its form into Amy's vaporous body. The entity enjoyed conquering every pore of Amy's slender frame. Slowly, the entity took control of Amy's body until it was in full control. The chaos entity looked around the cold dense room, it was relived that it was finally freed from the infernal prison that it has resided in for the past fifty years. 'Amy' suddenly heard very rushed footsteps, turning around she saw ____________
1122.title: Amy's body

choices: At last they make it outside
11222.content:
The entity turned around and saw a strange white feathered creature with some sort of garment standing in her way. "Amy, what are you doing here?" Replied the curious creature as you ransacked your new host brains for answers, it seems that your form was looking for a hedgehog named Sonic. "Oh, I thought I would find Sonic here" You replied, while blushing as if Rouge would fall for that. "Hmm, are you certain you would find him here? After all, not even Robotnic would bother coming here." She replied back, "Then why are you here? Are you looking for Knuckles again?" You responded as you gave a little giggle, Rouge just stood there blushing and rejecting the question. "Actually no, I'm looking for a client here" Rouge replied with a smile.

"Well, I was thinking how to get out of here, could you possibly show me the way out?" You replied seriously, Rouge then nods her head and begins going forward into the dark tunnels. "So, how did you find out I had a crush on Knuckles?" Rouge replied as she continued to blush, "Well, everyone knew since when you guys first laid each others eyes on each others" "Oh" Rouge replied, it seems her relationship was fairly obvious as she has begin giving Knuckles the "slip" over the past few years even though he doesn't seem to care she does in fact like him.

The entity stood there, shoving the teenage breasts that Amy possessed so that it could allow it to see farther but it seems the globes of flesh were glued permanently to her firm chest.
11222.title: Rouge the bat

choices: It works, Rouge is in control of the entity
It fails, the entity claims Rouge as a new host
112222.content:
The more they traveled through the caves, the more the new 'Amy' was beginning to doubt that Rouge knew where she was going... And the more she thought about how two heads were better than one, and she would love to inhabit the older, more experienced form as well. It had to know more... A small amount of its form seeped out of Amy's skin as she took on the appearance of a frightened girl, as to make sure Rouge wouldn't suspect anything as she approached her.

"Rouge, its so dark in here..." She shivered, taking Rouge's arm and clutching it tightly as Rouge frowned at her, shaking her head.

"Stop being such a baby, Amy..." She rolled her eyes at the hedgehog, though unknowingly, the entity had used the opportunity to slide up her arm, up towards her head. The bat had such large ears, such a convenient place to soak into its brain quickly and easily... Passing off the wetness as the cave dripping, Rouge batted at it lightly, only to separate the entity more. She stared at the piece of goo in her hand as the piece of it left on her head dove down her ear as she shuddered, gasping as she backed against the wall. The piece of it in her hand took the opportunity to dive down her throat as the two worked in conjunction to claim this new body...

Rouge slumped to the floor, twitching and groaning as Amy walked over to her, grinning as the entity controlling her became aware of both minds, though Rouge was much stronger than Amy. She still struggled against it even as she bolted awake... Then everything became crystal clear... Rouge was purposefully leading her the wrong way through the caverns, she had suspected something wrong with Amy, though she did not know what... She planned on leaving her stranded... The new Rouge glared at that as she got up, still squirming as the real Rouge was fighting, trying to worm her way into its mind...
112222.title: More corridors

choices: Go home and experiment with her powers more
Find somebody new to add to her collection
1122221.content:
Suddenly, Rouge found herself aware of not only herself, but also of the annoying pink hedgehog, Amy... She was right, something had been off with her as Amy stood there, slumped lightly... Was she waiting for her to make her do something?

She stood up slowly, rubbing her head as she felt the entity twitch within her, though she felt it from both ends... That bastard had tried to take her body away from her... She smirked lightly as she motioned Amy to come towards her. She began practicing controlling two bodies at once, discovering Amy's mind underneath its ooze... Well, why should she let Amy go? She was just an annoying nuisance, but now she could serve a much more useful purpose. She snapped her fingers as Amy's body began to melt as she let the entity within her consume her body... She'd leave herself solid, for now, until such a time as she was sure that she'd remain in control. The mass of Amy's body slid over towards her as she willed it to coat her... And then it turned solid once more as she looked herself over.

"Oh, this will be fun..." She said, at first with her voice, though it gradually changed to Amy's as she allowed Amy's ooze to slide down her throat a bit. She soon made her way to the exit.
1122221.title: It works, Rouge is in control of the entity

113.content: Whose body did you took control over?
113.title: A smooth, sleek body, a bit muscular (Male body)

12.content:
You hear a soft foot tap as water drops from the stalagmites from above, the footsteps sounds robotic and couldn't be metal or so. But you could also hear voices as well, very loud voices. Popping your head out a little revealed that your hunch was right, it seems there were robots carrying someone hostage.
You turn your attention to a blue crystal, it held someone or something inside. What ever it was, it was breathing but it seems eager yet cunning that it could escape the clutches of whom held it captive.

"I want Sonic to be quiet!" Yelled a rather large fellow whom the robots seems to follow every command, it seems he resembled a egg figure but he was also a human male.
Your attention soon moved to the figure named "Sonic" it seems that he was capable of protecting himself due to his rather large spikes that were actually hair. It occurred to you that, if you want to get out of here you'll have to follow these shadowed figures to where ever they were going to.
12.title: What's that?  Something's coming...

13.content: You frown, looking from side to side hurriedly as you dash up one of the tall things... You manage to get out of sight just in time as a guard comes out of the door to the base you'd just escaped. They quickly look around, dashing down a path as you sigh with relief mentally... That was a close one... But... Where were you? You hear somebody coming beneath your hiding place as you suddenly slip! You fall onto their head as they struggle, grabbing you. You were scared, you didn't know what to do... You could tell there were some hiding places inside them as you start crawling into them. They suddenly stop struggling as your own vision went dark... When you came to, several thoughts came flooding to the surface that were not your own... You suddenly think of a name... It was...
13.title: Voices...  Somebody's close by

choices: Possess her right on the spot
132.content:
It seems you have acquired a bounty hunter by the name of "Rouge", and it seems her ability were of use for you. Why she was here was of no concern of yours, all you wanted to do was get the hell out of here and fast. It seems after looking in her memories that she was lost herself and that she was following a friend when she suddenly got lost. The 'friend' was a pink looking creature with a rose red dress and had a desire to become partners with a creature with spikes on his head and had supersonic speed. It also seems that this body was fairly attractive as your memories show suburban males whistling at her while she jogged while they also observed these jello like pieces of flesh that stood on your new solid form.

However, you don't care to process all the other information as you soon won't be needing this inferior body that you possessed. Epically the large mounds that sits on "Rouge's" chest, those are truly bothersome to navigate with. However soon you began hearing rather abnormal voices as someone with a really annoying voice begins to shout some one's name across the quiet dark cave. "Oh where could she be? Oh man, if only I didn't run looking for Sonic here. But of course I couldn't since he's dreamy" The creature soon begins to hold both of her hands together and day dream as she continued walking. She then spots you and rushes to you, "Oh my goodness, where have you been Rouge?! I've been looking everywhere for you!" She soon burst into tears as you try your hardest to show emotion of course you felt none as this creature is nothing but a pathetic weakling however, you could use her and add her to your collection. Or, you could confront her and ask what happened.
132.title: Rouge

choices: Just possess her and shut her up
Amy starts dragging you along anyway
1321.content:
"Amy, come on..." It made Rouge frown, still getting used to the new body it has acquired. "Let's keep going... I heard Eggman's robots nearby, we need to get out of here before we get caught."

Eggman... It searched this shell's memories... A crude nickname given to the one who held it captive... Once it had more bodies, perhaps it would return to seek its revenge... Amy cocked and eyebrow inquisitively. "Since when are you scared of a tussle with Eggman's bots?" 'Rouge' just shook her head.

"Why start a fight unnecessarily? Besides, I think that if Sonic were here, we'd see lots more wreckage. Let's just head back towards the city." She continued to try to prod the pink hedgehog back... She was nothing if not persistent, however... Annoyingly so.

"No, I wanna prove to him that I can handle things... Besides, if I get caught, then I can get rescued by him." She grinned, daydreaming again as she smiled. It growled in Rouge's mind... This annoying pink thing wouldn't leave before she got herself captured by the Eggman's robots...
1321.title: Ask what happened

1322.content:
Amy continued sobbing into Rouge's chest as she rubbed her back as if to console her. She chuckled lightly to herself... It was far too easy...

"Oh Amy... Don't worry. It will all be over soon..."

She looked up at her, confused as she planted a kiss on Amy's lips as a portion of the entity pounced down her throat. Amy pulled back violently, gagging as the entity squirmed its way through heouger body and into her brain. Rouge smirked at that... While both of her bodies might have these strange growths, further investigation showed that they had an abundance of nerve endings, making mild stimulation of them quite pleasurable...
1322.title: Possess her right on the spot

135.content: It wasn't any of those names, they must have been acquaintances of whomever you were now. No, it was...
135.title: Other

info.brief_description: In Sonic's world, some liquid entity has come and is entering the bodies of the Sonic crew
info.description:
Somewhere, in a lab or in the wilds, a creature made of saturated liquid Chaos Energy awaits. Its energy signature is similar to Chaos... It very well might be him, but its too early to tell.

This is a possession story. I do not guarantee Gift Points, but they will be given out for exceptional chapters added. You are a Chaos-entity, searching for a body. Your character has no innate gender except that which it identifies to later in the story. Please follow these guidelines

1. Proper grammar/spelling/punctuation
2. Sex is allowed, but please be reasonable with it. I am allowing gay/lesbian relationships, only between possessed subjects however.
3. Have fun with it
4. No needless entry choices (i.e. Right or Left Ear?)
5. The Chaos-entity may absorb a host and then reform that body under its control, complete with mind and personality. This makes the person completely the entity's.
6. The entity can split into multiple pieces and take several people at once.
7. The entity's power is not infallible. It may be possible to turn the tables and begin controlling IT.

As I said, have fun :)
